personalInfo.name: Donovan Piper
personalInfo.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer | Founding Engineer (AI & Cloud Platforms)

summary: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable, high-impact applications across enterprise, healthcare, financial, and SaaS environments. Proven Founding Engineer with deep expertise in AI integrations, cloud-native architecture, and full-stack development. Strong focus on performance, reliability, automation, and user experience at scale.

experience.title: Founding Engineer
highlights: Built a next-generation legal document automation platform serving 10,000+ users with redlining, version control, and e-signatures
Designed AI-powered contract review and clause detection using Generative AI and chatbots, improving review efficiency by 40%+
Delivered React Native workflows that increased platform adoption by 35% and reduced document review time from 25 to ~15 minutes
Improved infrastructure scalability and uptime to 99.8% using Docker, Redis caching, Kafka event streams, and monitoring pipelines
Implemented OAuth authentication and role-based access control supporting 5,000+ concurrent users
Engineered a healthcare data platform with real-time monitoring and AI analytics serving 5,000+ medical users
Mentored 4–6 engineers and introduced CI/CD and automated testing, reducing post-deployment issues by ~30%

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Modernized financial transaction systems processing 1.5M+ transactions per day with 99.9% uptime
Built customer onboarding and payment flows used by 200K+ monthly active users
Optimized GraphQL analytics pipelines, reducing report generation time from 12s to under 8s
Implemented AI/ML anomaly detection analyzing millions of transactions daily
Deployed 30+ microservices on AWS and GCP using Docker, Kubernetes, and serverless functions
Maintained full compliance with financial regulations resulting in zero critical audit findings

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Built enterprise web applications supporting 6,000+ internal users across multiple regions
Redesigned BI dashboards reducing load times from ~8–10s to ~3–4s
Designed and integrated 20+ REST APIs eliminating manual CSV workflows
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Netlify, enabling on-demand releases
Developed 200+ unit and E2E tests, reducing post-deployment defects by 30%+
Provided technical mentorship and React performance optimizations across teams

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Built a drag-and-drop workflow builder using React and TypeScript
Implemented event-driven workflow execution with Node.js and AWS Lambda
Developed real-time monitoring using WebSockets for lab sample execution
Optimized PostgreSQL schemas and queries, improving performance by ~40%
Reduced workflow execution failures by 30% through improved reliability patterns
Collaborated with QA and DevOps to support CI/CD and production monitoring

certifications: AWS Certified Developer – Amazon Web Services (2023)
